roleset.name: add to or correct, adding to, correcting

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The company said it amended its shareholder rights plan by reducing to 10 % from 20 % the level of ownership by an outsider that would trigger the issuance to other holders of rights to buy additional shares of Nashua common at half price .

propbank.arg: by reducing to 10 % from 20 % the level of ownership by an outsider that would trigger the issuance to other holders of rights to buy additional shares of Nashua common at half price

example.name: with secondary predication
example.text: PS of New Hampshire amended its plan to call for two years of 5.5 % rate increases followed by five years of 4.5 % increases .

propbank.arg: to call for two years of 5.5 % rate increases followed by five years of 4.5 % increases

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: First of all . as I take it from his amendment of S. 7 , he wants the words " anywhere within Kenya " deleted and the words " within the district or area in which he is appointed " inserted in the place thereof .

roleset.note: AMEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'amend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. (from amend.01-v predicate notes)
AMENDMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN eventive nouns, amend.01. No VNcls. (from amendment.01-n)
Be careful-- if it's refering to a specific Amendment (proper noun), it's refering to that particular idea, not the act of amending, and is not eventive. (from amendment.01-n)

roleset.name: able to be added to, edited

example.name: arg1
example.text: Several key bills remain very much alive and are in theory amendable .

roleset.note: AMENDABLE-J UPDATE: The original "amendable" example from medi-tmprl was a typo for "amenable" so the example did not make sense with the frame. Changed to a non-medical internet example.
AMENDABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to 'amend.01'. (from amendable.01-j)
